most of the Iranian people I would say
if you want to talk about an average
Iranian would like there to be a
relationship with America that again as
I say based on mutual respect that also
doesn't mean that Iran will will become
subservient to America or has to do what
America says every time um this this
sense of being a weak power um is kind
of now gone Iran doesn't have that sense
the Iranian people don't have that sense
anymore they don't want to be
subservient to a foreign power it's
really something that makes them very
uncomfortable and given what they've
gone through in the last 30 years and
being able to survive on their own as an
independent nation um it's it's a very
strong sense now among the Iranian
people that we don't need to be
subservient to another country so as
long as America doesn't dictate to Iran
what to do how to vote at the UN how to
do this whether to do this or not do
that um I think Iranians would love to
see a relationship the vast majority I
think every poll that has been taken
unofficial poll in Iran has indicated
that and I think it's true in my own
experience talking to you know the
average
Iranian on the street you know in homes
from the upper class to the working
class there hasn't been a single person
who said oh no you know we can't let the
Americans back in this country because
they're evil I've never heard that it's
it's quite the opposite no we would like
to have relations but they have to
understand us they have to respect us
they have to understand who we are
